name: odoo-auto-manifest-init
description: Automatically manages Odoo module's __manifest__.py and __init__.py. Adds or comments out XML (views, wizard, data, security) and Python files (models, wizard) on file changes for rapid Odoo development.

commands.title: Odoo: Show Manifest & Init Setup Panel

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
